perfil.sobre: I'm a professional Web Developer. Our Main Goal to help & Satisficed the Local & Global Clients by web development solutions

sobre.description: Hello, I'm Alexandre Brasil, a 23-year-old enthusiast in Web Development. Over the past 3 years, I have been deeply immersed in studying and working in the field, with a special focus on the JavaScript ecosystem. My journey began in 2017 during my Information Technology Management course at Unicesumar. There, I gained essential knowledge in programming logic, algorithms, and had my first encounter with languages like C and Java. After completing the course, I sought further expertise and specialized in Mobile Development at Unyleya University. Throughout this journey, I've explored technologies such as JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Type Script, React Native, React JS, Flutter, among others. Currently, I am primarily focused on the JavaScript ecosystem, dedicating myself daily to creating new projects to apply my knowledge in practice. I'm always seeking challenges that allow me to grow professionally and contribute to creating exceptional web experiences. If you're interested in collaborating or learning more about my projects, feel free to get in touch.

my_services.description: O Web Designer é responsável pelo design e layout de páginas web, criando experiências visuais atraentes e funcionais para os usuários.
O desenvolvedor mobile é responsável pelo desenvolvimento do aplicativos por completo, desde a interface até sua lógica de programação.
O Designer é responsável por criar soluções visuais atraentes e funcionais para diversos meios, incluindo design gráfico, design de interface de usuário (UI).
Marketing Digital é encarregado de promover produtos ou serviços por meio de canais online, como redes sociais.
O especialista em Modelagem 3D cria representações tridimensionais de objetos, cenários ou personagens.
Profissionais de vídeos animados utilizam ferramentas de animação para criar vídeos dinâmicos e cativantes.
